frontmatter.title: How to add a gallery of shoppable videos to your site.
frontmatter.metaTitle: How to add a gallery of shoppable videos to your site.
frontmatter.metaDesc: Reactive enables you to easily add a gallery of shoppable videos to any page on your site.

pageProps.content:
This guide details how to add an in-page gallery of shoppable videos to your site. There is no coding experience required and can be accomplished easily in the Reactive app.

*EXAMPLE*
![Product page embed](/blog-assets/insert-gallery/gallery.png)

Reactive automatically creates a "Past Live Events" gallery where your most recent live events are automatically added as you go. [Read more here](/support/how-to-embed-a-live-events-gallery-on-your-site/) to see where to find the snippet for the "Past Live Events" gallery.

### 1. Create a Gallery and get the embed snippet

1. On the app home page, click "Create New" and select the "Content gallery for your site" option. ![Click "create new" and select "Content Gallery"](/blog-assets/insert-gallery/select-create-new-and-gallery.png)
2. Select which videos you want to add to your gallery and click "Create Gallery".
*NOTE: You can only add up to 9 video in a gallery* ![Create gallery](/blog-assets/insert-gallery/create-gallery.png)
3. Click the "Embed Gallery" button and copy the gallery HTML snippet.
*Note: You can select "exclude title" if you don't want to display the title of the gallery on your site* ![Copy embed snippet](/blog-assets/insert-gallery/copy-embed-script.png)

### 2. Add the snippet to a custom page.

1. Click on "Pages" in the "Online Store" sales channel in the side menu. ![Click "pages" in the online store menu](/blog-assets/insert-video/navigate-to-pages.png)
2. Select the page you want to add the gallery to, or create a new page. ![Select of create a new page](/blog-assets/insert-video/select-or-create-a-page.png)
2. In the "Content" text editor, select the "Insert Video" tool. ![Select Insert Video](/blog-assets/insert-video/select-insert-video-custom-page.png)
3. Paste the snippet into the provided text box. ![Paste Snippet](/blog-assets/insert-video/paste-snippet.png)
4. Click the `Insert Video` button to save. ![Save and insert](/blog-assets/insert-gallery/click-insert-video-gallery.png)
5. Visit the page to ensure that the gallery is showing as expected on your site.

### 3. Add the snippet to your homepage or theme template.

1. Access the theme editor from your Shopify admin. Click the "Online Store" tab, then the "Customize" button. ![](/blog-assets/Frame113.png)
2. Add a new section or block by clicking either "+ Add section" or  "+ Add Block" in the side menu. ![](/blog-assets/Frame114.png)
3. Select "Custom Liquid" from the pop-up menu. ![](/blog-assets/Frame115.png)
4. Paste the embed snippet in the "Custom Liquid" text field. ![](/blog-assets/Frame116.png)
5. Click the "Save" button to add the gallery video to the template. ![](/blog-assets/Frame117.png)
6. Visit a the home page or a page using the modified template to ensure that the gallery is showing as expected on your site.

If you are looking to add your snippet in a more custom manner or to a non-shopify site, this is likely a task that you'd ask your developer to accomplish. If you had any issues while following this guide, please reach out to [support@reactive.live](mailto:support@reactive.live) for more information.
